summary: Activates <doc-ocp-name translate=no>True</doc-ocp-name> or <doc-ocp-name translate=no>False</doc-ocp-name> output control port according to the <doc-idp-name translate=no>Condition</doc-idp-name> input data port value.

dataPorts.Condition: the boolean value to be tested.

controlPorts.True: is activated if the value of <doc-idp-name translate=no>Condition</doc-idp-name> is true.
controlPorts.False: is activated if the value of <doc-idp-name translate=no>Condition</doc-idp-name> is false.
